data.name: 為你臣服 Demo
data.detailed_description:
◇Features
◇Full CG mode can be opened in the environment setting to browse HCGs freely
◇Stress-free operation--fast text skipping system

◇Story

‘I can fulfill your sexual fantasies, but I will not penetrate you with any part of my body during this game.’
‘Today I will take you through a real tutelage, and when it is over, if you are satisfied and can trust me, I will help you to heal your disorder.’
‘If you are comfortable with that, take off your jacket, get down on your knees and kiss my feet. Or get dressed and go home.’
‘Remember, the game starts once you get down on your knees and kiss my feet.’

I stared down at the feet that had just been running around in leather shoes, now covered in black socks. I could imagine how they might taste.

I closed my eyes and made my choice--

◇Gameplay Instructions

A POV game, with the player taking on the role of Li Ling and gradually developing the relationship between Li Ling and Zhou Chun by making choices throughout the texts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains nudity or sexual content, general mature content, sexual acts or sexual assault/non-consensual sex, or BDSM.
All characters are over the age of 20.
